mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into post (perfect, overhead, user_id, `state`, area_id, create_time, `type`, see, score, title, qq_group) values (#{perfect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overhead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{see,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update post set perfect = #{perfect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, overhead = #{overhead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, see = #{see,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_group = #{qqGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, perfect, overhead, user_id, `state`, area_id, create_time, `type`, see, score, title, qq_group from post where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
